title: Large-Scale 3D Medical Image Pre-training with Geometric Context Priors

abstract: The scarcity of annotations poses a significant challenge in medical image analysis. Large-scale pre-training has emerged as a promising label-efficient solution, owing to the utilization of large-scale data, large models, and advanced pre-training …
